comment:
Extracted Variables:
1. \( x_1 \): Number of hours factory 1 should be run
2. \( x_2 \): Number of hours factory 2 should be run
3. \( \text{allergy\_pills\_factory\_1} \): Number of allergy pills produced by factory 1
4. \( \text{fever\_pills\_factory\_1} \): Number of fever reducing pills produced by factory 1
5. \( \text{allergy\_pills\_factory\_2} \): Number of allergy pills produced by factory 2
6. \( \text{fever\_pills\_factory\_2} \): Number of fever reducing pills produced by factory 2
7. \( \text{rare\_compound\_used} \): Total units of rare compound used by both factories

Constraints:
1. \( 20x_1 + 10x_2 \geq 700 \): Minimum requirement for allergy pills
2. \( 15x_1 + 30x_2 \geq 600 \): Minimum requirement for fever reducing pills
3. \( 20x_1 + 30x_2 \leq 1000 \): Total rare compound units constraint

Objective:
- Minimize the maximum of \( x_1 \) and \( x_2 \), representing the total time needed to produce the required pills.
